A Chance Encounter

Dimly lit room; tension hangs thick.  
Raskolnikov feels uneasy.  
Svidrigaïlov: “I saw you this morning.”  

Raskolnikov: “Where did you see me?”  
Svidrigaïlov: “You remind me of myself.”  

---  

Bright street; curiosity piqued.  
Raskolnikov: “Are you traveling soon?”  
Svidrigaïlov: “What travels? A journey?”  

Svidrigaïlov: “I might get married instead.”  
Raskolnikov: “Here?”  
Svidrigaïlov: “Yes, but I want to see Avdotya.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov informs Raskolnikov that Marfa Petrovna left money for Avdotya Romanovna in her will.
